item.title: A Muslim Candidate's Unorthodox Strategy
item.itunes:keywords: politics, new york, gay, campaign, bangladesh
item.itunes:author: Musa Syeed and Bassam Tariq
item.itunes:summary: Mujib Rahman wanted to be the first Bangladeshi elected to New York's City Council. His strategy: tell voters about his opponent's sexuality
